# get_ingredient_image { #py_mealdb.MealDB.get_ingredient_image }

```python
MealDB.get_ingredient_image(ingredient)
```

Fetches and saves a full-size ingredient image locally.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name       | Type   | Description                                      | Default    |
|------------|--------|--------------------------------------------------|------------|
| ingredient | str    | The ingredient name (e.g., 'tomato', 'chicken'). | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                                            |
|--------|--------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | bool   | True if the image was successfully fetched and saved, False otherwise. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type                  | Description                               |
|--------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------|
|        | httpx.HTTPError       | If the HTTP request fails.                |
|        | httpx.HTTPStatusError | If the API returns a non-2xx status code. |
